quotes.author: the Bible
quotes.phrase: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and you shall find.

quotes.author: William Shakespeare
quotes.phrase: A rose by any other name would smell as sweet.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.phrase: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.phrase: Speak softly and carry a big stick.

quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quotes.phrase: What doesn't kill us makes us stronger.

quotes.author: Mahatma Ghandi
quotes.phrase: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
